description: This Java class defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints such as welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and app info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for the Notes Backend application.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message to clients.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects clients to the Swagger UI documentation page, preserving the original request's scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a basic health check endpoint returning 'OK'.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns a string with application information.
